ministry.name: Free Indeed (Addictions) Ministry
ministry.overview: Calvary's Free Indeed Ministry is an outreach to our church and community to provide hope and freedom for those who are enslaved to addictions, whether it be pornography, substance abuse, overeating, smoking, homosexuality or other addictions.

p.strong: "So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed." -- John 8:36

long-description.p: First and foremost, we must tell you that God's grace is able to help you overcome any sin, and there is hope for you. Our approach to dealing with these addictions is to partner with an online program made available through Setting Captives Free. We direct you to their web page for the particular topic and study program, but also provide you local support and accountability. The below links will connect you with their web page where you can read about the particular programs. They will assign you a mentor, but you can also copy someone as an accountability partner. If you don't already have an accountability partner in Calvary, we will provide you one, and we ask that you include the appropriate email below in the cc field at the bottom of your day one study. This will forward your day 1 study to the accountability coordinator who will assign your accountability partner. Your personal accountability partner will contact you immediately to provide you support.
Calvary's Free Indeed (CFI) Accountability for Men: cfi_male@calvaryaustin.org
Calvary's Free Indeed (CFI) Accountability for Women: cfi_female@calvaryaustin.org
